snippet: After being held scoreless by the Royals for six innings, the Yankees managed only one run for the third time in their last five games.
abstract: Kansas City Royals defeat New York Yankees, 5-1. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- Minutes after the Yankees' 5-1 loss to the Kansas City Royals on Saturday, Alex Rodriguez sat in front of a laptop in the clubhouse examining video of his at-bats in the game, none of which were productive. Rodriguez is one of several Yankee hitters not meeting expectations at the plate, and he seemed particularly intent upon finding a flaw somewhere as he pored over the video.

headline.main: Bats Go Quiet As Yankees Lose Again
